title: Land for Sale in Eravur Town
details:
LAND FOR SALE IN ERAVUR TOWN
• Size-7 perch square land
• Location- Eravu Town, Batticaloa
• Electricity available
• Located in the heart of Eraur.Suitable to build a house, Shop, Warehouse.
• Distance to Main road- 3 meters
• Ideal to buy & sell as an future investment
• Asking Price 6.7Mil
• Reason to sell- Leaving Country
• Contact info- 0772841270( Nilam Salim)
